long_description: The boys' 686 Dickies Safety insulated jacket exudes cool, work-wear style and harnesses waterproof, breathable performance to keep kids feeling as good as they look on the slopes. Durable polyester fabric features INFIDRY-10(TM) waterproof breathable coating and taped critical seams for reliable protection from wind and water. Light insulation in the body, sleeves and hood helps ensure warmth without bulk and continues to insulate when wet. Smooth lining easily slides over base layers. Youth Evolution sleeves extend 1.5 in. to keep up with child's growth for another season. Exposed metal front zipper; adjustable hood; hand pockets; adjustable powder skirt; rip-and-stick cuffs; front and back reflective stripes.
short_description: The boys' 686 Dickies Safety insulated jacket exudes cool, work-wear style and harnesses waterproof, breathable performance to keep kids feeling as good as they look on the slopes.
